name: superfine
description: Minimal view layer for building web interfaces.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.test: nyc -r lcov testmatrix test/test.js && nyc report
scripts.build: export pkg=$npm_package_name; npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run unpkg
scripts.release: v=$npm_package_version; npm run build && git commit -am $v && git tag -s $v -m $v && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
